MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH66 postcode area of Ellesmere Port, affecting properties in Hope Farm Road, Humber Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:21PM. Our engineers are on their way to area to investigate and repair a suspected blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:30PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:28PM on 27th November 2020.
